title: Mystery Skin Disappearance
body: I was in the store and i noticed that i had to buy Infernal Nasus when i already got it from a friends mystery gift. The photo i have attached is the evidence backing to it, with my friend's name covered up. Also with the photo showing that i dont own it.

replies.body:
What happens if you click on it? Does it let you buy it again?

Most importantly, are you able to actually use the skin?
